 Hear all yours frank, loud and clear, just don't have time to write dow=
n all they are saying though, they are regular little chatter boxes over th=
ere at your house Frank. sf



-----Original Message-----
From: Frank Sumpt=
ion <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com; RTSC@yah=
oogroups.com
Sent: Fri, Oct 1, 2010 2:32 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] FM [1 Attach=
ment]

          =C2=A0                                            [Attachm=
ent(s) from Frank Sumption included below]                       
=C2=A0=C2=
=A0 Less than a minute of FM, you can hear more feedback in this--feedback =
is from being in echo chamber mode. At 3 seconds "box---big box', 15--secon=
ds "Hultay gets---something", at about 23 seconds a weird one "the end come=
s in hours--you leave=C2=A0the planet", like I haven't heard that about a t=
housand times. 
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0I found if I lift the top panel up I kills =
the feedback, so I drilled some 3/8 vent holes in the sides that helped qui=
te a bit. 
 =C2=A0
 =C2=A0These aren't Jack approved EVPs, so probably not =
real, since they are not in digital format--except conversion to mp3 for e-=
mailing. This recording started out braodcast out of the radio station anal=
og, traveled to the radio in analog RF, was down converted in the radio chi=
p in analog circuits, and the audio was recorded on magnetic tape. The EVPs=
 are clearer from tape, that's why I use it, cuz digital sucks! I'd use tub=
es if it wasn't for the high voltage power supplies and larger transformers=
. Some worship this high tech crap, which is killing the planet. They over =
estimate it's true value. 
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S
 
      
                 
 =
  
       
  


----------MB_8CD2F9F3B42FF69_1410_1CB71_webmail-m042.sysops.aol.com

<div></div>

<div>   Less than a minute of FM, you can hear mo=
re feedback in this--feedback is from being in echo chamber mode. At 3 seco=
nds "box---big box', 15--seconds "Hultay gets---something", at about 23 sec=
onds a weird one "the end comes in hours--you leave the planet", like =
I haven't heard that about a thousand times. </div>
  
<div> </div>
 
=
<div> I found if I lift the top panel up I kills the feedback, so I dr=
illed some 3/8 vent holes in the sides that helped quite a bit. </div>
 
<d=
iv> </div>
 
<div> These aren't Jack approved EVPs, so probably n=
ot real, since they are not in digital format--except conversion to mp3 for=
 e-mailing. This recording started out braodcast out of the radio station a=
nalog, traveled to the radio in analog RF, was down converted in the radio =
chip in analog circuits, and the audio was recorded on magnetic tape. The E=
VPs are clearer from tape, that's why I use it, cuz digital sucks! I'd use =
tubes if it wasn't for the high voltage power supplies and larger transform=
ers. Some worship this high tech crap, which is killing the planet. They ov=
er estimate it's true value. </div>
  
<div> </div>
 
<div> F-S</=
div>
 
<div></div>
